Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an example of creative freedom and timeliness, has just as much affection for bad puns than Ninja and loves violence especially one upping death with over the top explosives. Katho Grüenling also stars in this fun low budget action-comedy love story set at Christmas Time
